configuration_schema.description: Describe the configuration of Multi-Chassis Ethernet Link Aggregation Manager.

mc-elam.description: Describe the parameters of MC-ELAM to be configured.

service-switch.description: MC-ELAM service switch, its default value depends on the performance parameters.

mc-elam-instances.description: Describe the parameters of MC-ELAM instances to be configured.

mc-elam.description: Describe the parameters of MC-ELAM instance to be configured.

advertise-interval.description: The advertise interval of MC-ELAM instance.

system-priority.description: The system priority of MC-ELAM instance.

source-ip.description: The source IP address of MC-ELAM instance.

destination-ip.description: The destination IP address of MC-ELAM instance.

system-mac.description: The system MAC of MC-ELAM instance.

detect-multiplier.description: The detect multiplier of MC-ELAM instance.

revertive-case.description: The restore mode of smartgroup is revertive.

immediately-case.description: The restore mode of smartgroup is immediately.

immediately.description: The restore mode of smartgroup is immediately.

non-revertive-case.description: The restore mode of smartgroup is non-revertive.

non-revertive.description: The restore mode of smartgroup is non-revertive.

track.description: Describe the parameters of MC-ELAM track to be configured.

track-instances.description: Describe the parameters of MC-ELAM track instances to be configured.

bind.description: Describe the parameters of the bound smartgroup to be configured.

smartgroup-id.description: The group id bound to MC-ELAM instance, its maximum value depends on the performance parameters.

bind-mode.description: The bind mode of smartgroup. Smartgroup has three bind modes, auto and master and slave.

virtual-priority.description: The virtual system priority of MC-ELAM instance.

virtual-sys-mac.description: The virtual system MAC of MC-ELAM instance.

actor-mc-elam-role.description: The MC-ELAM role of actor MC-ELAM instance.

actor-lacp-role.description: The LACP role of actor smartgroup.

actor-sg-admin-state.description: The admin state of actor smartgroup.

actor-sg-protocol-state.description: The protocol state of actor smartgroup.

actor-advertise-interval.description: The advertise interval of actor MC-ELAM instance.

actor-detect-multiplier.description: The detect multiplier of actor MC-ELAM instance.

actor-pw-fault.description: Whether the actor PW associated to track is UP.

partner-mc-elam-role.description: The MC-ELAM role of partner MC-ELAM instance.

partner-lacp-role.description: The LACP role of partner smartgroup.

partner-sg-protocol-state.description: The protocol state of partner smartgroup.

partner-advertise-interval.description: The advertise interval of partner MC-ELAM instance.

partner-detect-multiplier.description: The detect multiplier of partner MC-ELAM instance.

partner-pw-fault.description: Whether the partner PW associated to track is UP.
